sentences.sContent: All the children will receive a small gift.
sentences.sCn: 每个孩子都会收到一份小礼物。

sentences.sContent: Lee received 324 votes (= 324 people voted for him ) .
If you would like to receive further information , return the attached form.
sentences.sCn: 欲收到详细资料，请交回所附表格。

sentences.sContent: She isn’t well enough to receive visitors yet.
sentences.sCn: 她身体还不是很好，不能见客。

sentences.sContent: ...and new research reveals that men are more likely to receive excellent letters of recommendation...
...because they receive satisfaction from the results of constructive work...
...You'll also be able to receive e-mail...
...Why did Alex fail to receive the warm response he had hoped for...
...states that people should pay taxes based on the benefits they receive from government services...
...You’ll also be able to receive email...
...Why did Alex fail to receive the warm response he had hoped for...
...Students are e-mailing their professors to receive and discuss their classroom assignments and to submit them...

words.tran: 被一般承认的；被认为标准的
接待；接收；招待会；感受；反应
接收器；接受者；收信机；收款员，接待者
接受能力；[生理] 感受性
收到；接受；迎接（receive的过去分词）
